CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Data__c,"Base Data Service"), "Base Data Service, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Data__c,"NCOA"), "NCOA, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Data__c,"Merge / Perge"), "Merge / Perge, ",NULL)+''+ IF(INCLUDES(Mailing_Data__c,"Tracking / Plant Code"), "Tracking / Plant Code",NULL)+''
CustomField.label: Mailing Data Formatting
